title: Review copies at Black Gate
author: VD
content_html: In case you missed out on the previous offer, it may interest you to know that John O’Neill of Black Gate Magazine is giving away 25 free review copies of A Magic Broken at Black Gate.  He emailed me to let me know he has a few left, so if you’d like a copy and are willing to write a review, please visit Black Gate.
content_text:
In case you missed out on the previous offer, it may interest you to know that John O’Neill of Black Gate Magazine is giving away 25 free review copies of
A Magic Broken
at Black Gate.  He emailed me to let me know he has a few left, so if you’d like a copy and are willing to write a review,
please visit Black Gate
.
